headline: Trafalgar Ohio Poll: Vance 26, Dolan 22, Mandel 21
author: John McCormack
sentences:
A new Trafalgar poll conducted from Friday to Sunday shows a competitive three-way race in Tuesdays Ohio GOP Senate primary:
New Trafalgar Poll: Vance 26.2%, Dolan 22.0%, Mandel 20.8% https://t.co/OFqBNPBtaa
Poll conducted April 29-May 1. https://t.co/0ezv35bhiy pic.twitter.com/jQucqTnF45
 John McCormack (@McCormackJohn) May 2, 2022
Trafalgars previous poll of the race was conducted just before former president Donald Trump endorsed J.D.
The new Trafalgar survey the second public poll that finds Dolan surging and Vance leading in the final days of the campaign.
Vance on April 15, and it showed Mandel at 28 percent, Vance at 23 percent, Gibbons at 14 percent, and Dolan at 12 percent.
An Emerson poll conducted Thursday and Friday pegged Vance at 26 percent, Mandel at 24 percent, and Dolan at 21 percent.
